svg.text: Complete User Journey from Login to SOX Compliance Achievement
Primary Users: CEO, CFO, Executive Team
Primary Users: SOX Manager, IT Manager
Primary Users: SOX Analysts, Process Owners

USER FLOW LEGEND & UI ROUTING RULES
‚Ä¢ Planning Phase: Focus on assessment & setup interfaces ‚Ä¢ Foundation Phase: Layer-specific UI progression
‚Ä¢ Execution Phase: Testing & monitoring dashboards ‚Ä¢ Optimization: Knowledge capture & template management
‚Ä¢ First-time users see setup wizards ‚Ä¢ Returning users bypass to appropriate dashboard
‚Ä¢ AI learns user preferences & customizes interface layout automatically
From Initial Login to Market-Dominant Platform - Every User Journey Mapped
